title: Unit Circle Coordinates Quiz
instructions: This quiz will review our knowledge on plotting points on a unit circle. Remember that x=cos(θ) and y=sin(θ).

questions.question: Determine the x-coordinate of the point shown.
Determine the y-coordinate of the point shown.
If the x-coordinate of point P is (√2)/2, determine the corresponding angle in radians. Assume a positive y-axis.
If the y-coordinate of point P is (√2)/2, determine the corresponding angle in degrees. Assume positive x-axis
Determine the x-coordinate of the point shown
Determine the y-coordinate of the point shown
If the x coordinate of point P is -0.3, determine the corresponding angle (standard position). Assume a positive y-axis).
If the y coordinate of point P is -0.8, determine the corresponding angle (standard position). Assume a negative x-axis.
